    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulatorAPI

        public SimulatorAPI(int buttons,
                    int pins,
                    int cells)
        Constructs a new SimulatorAPI object.
        Parameters:
        buttons - is the number of buttons to be shown on the window.
        pins - is the number of pins to be shown on the window.
        cells - is the number of cells (set of pins) to be shown on the window.

      • setPin

        public void setPin(int pinNumbr,
                   int cellNumber)
        Sets a particular pin at a particular cell to green if it was red or red if it was green.
        Parameters:
        pinNumbr - is the number of the pin to set.
        cellNumber - is the number of the cell in which the desired pin is.
